Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran hit 98 runs, including 6 fours and 8 sixes, in 53 balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Nicholas Pooran was named Player of the Match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won the toss and elected to bat first.
The match took place at Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia.
